text:
Rackspace is hiring. I've been here a year in the Austin office working on new cloud products and I have to say it's the best place I've ever worked. The Rack is very family friendly with great benefits and lots of cool folks.

In my team we're looking for a Java dev or two for the Cloud DNS product, but we have openings for all kinds of stuff building on OpenStack.

All the details here: http://rackertalent.com
